column5: Walking Distance to Medical Center Hospitals Fully gated community within a 5-7 minute walk to the Metro Light Rail as well as the metro bus stops that service the greater Houston area with particular focus on The Medical Center as well downtown.  Cleaning services all of your utilities are included at no additional cost. It is included all of your appliances as well as central a/c and your complete furnishings for your temporary home.
column8: Texas Medical Center Fully Furnished Apartment
